sqlMap.select: select a.prod_id, a.prod_name, b.brand_name, c.photo_path from prod a, brand b, photo c where a.prod_id = c.prod_id and a.brand_id = b.brand_id
select a.prod_id, a.prod_name, a.prod_resell, a.org_price, b.photo_path, c.brand_name from prod a, photo b, brand c where a.prod_id = b.prod_id and a.brand_id = c.brand_id and a.prod_id = #prodid#
sqlMap.update: insert into like_prod values( (select nvl(max(to_number(like_id)),0)+1 from like_prod), #mem_email#, #prod_id#)
sqlMap.select: select c.prod_id, a.bid_id, a.temp_price, a.temp_date, c.size_name from bid_temp a, bid b, prod_size c where a.bid_id = b.bid_id and b.size_id = c.size_id and c.prod_id = #prod_id# and c.size_name = #size_name# order by temp_date

select max(e.temp_price) as mprice from bid_temp e, (select max(d.mdate) as mmdate from (select c.temp_price as tprice, a.prod_id, c.temp_date as mdate from prod_size a, bid b, bid_temp c where a.SIZE_ID = b.SIZE_ID and b.bid_id = c.bid_id and a.prod_id = #prod_id# and a.SIZE_NAME = #size_name#) d ) f where e.temp_date = f.mmdate
select count(*) from LIKE_PROD where MEM_EMAIL = #mem_email# and PROD_ID = #prod_id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from like_prod where mem_email = #mem_email# and prod_id = #prod_id#
